gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.scanner

Class TargetScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.scanner.TargetScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scanner

    public class TargetScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scanner
    Class to process projects, directories, archives and files and to obtain classfile information using a classfile parser.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

      • seek

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> seek(java.io.File file,
                                   java.io.FilenameFilter filter)
        A generic recursive file finder with filename filter. It sorts file list in alphabetical order and removes repeated elements.
        Specified by:
        seek in interface Scanner
        Parameters:
        file - It could be a folder or a file.
        filter - Crafted name filter of files. It specifies which files to seek.
        Returns:
        a list of files selected by the filename filter.
